INTRO_DEF (Frame 01):
Ocean Literacy (OL)
is the understanding of
the Ocean-humanity
mutual influence
define_P (Frame 02):
Ocean Literacy (OL)
is based on
[COUNTER-P] Scientific
Principles.
clarify_P (Frame 03):
See Principles as the
7 macro traits
of the Ocean.
define_Pe (Frame 04):
Ocean knowledge
can be seen through
[COUNTER-Pe] Perspectives.
clarify_Pe (Frame 05):
See Perspectives as
the 7 points of view
from which Ocean
features and challenges
can be explained
and contextualised.
define_D (Frame 06):
Ocean knowledge
can be conveyed
through [COUNTER-D] Dimensions.
clarify_D (Frame 07):
See Dimensions as
the 10 approaches
that can be adopted
to transfer
OL Principles
and Perspectives.
